name: Initial Charm Necklace - Sterling Silver
description:
A necklace that makes a fantastic gift!

Initial charms are sweet, and I make them from 2 squares of sheet silver. I stamp and embellish the smaller, initial square, then solder it to a larger piece of sterling silver sheet. Each charm is different and unique, as I use design stamps to embellish the edges of the initial layer of silver. The charms are about 15 mm long by 13 mm wide. It dangles from the necklace on a very sturdy jump ring. The chain flat link chain is 18 inches long. Add as many charms as you like!

Please specify a letter when ordering. Any letter (or number) is available. I will gladly add additional charms for $28 each (additional chains can also be purchased). Also, If you would like any additional wording or date stamped on the back, it will be an additional charge of $7. If you would like to purchase the charm for a charm bracelet or separately, please let me know! The length of the chain can also be customized. Please contact me with any questions. 

These charms are special and have a rustic, handmade look to them. They make great bridesmaids' gifts. Also available on a torque bracelet (see listing).

name: Stamped Stacker Rings
description:
A set of four stacking rings are handmade from square sterling silver wire. I've stamped designs on them, and hammered them. I also bevel the edges for comfort. This set includes sunbursts, dots, small swirls, and plain hammered. They are great when worn as a group of four, but I also love them individually, two, or three. 

Because they are made to order, and are handmade, there will be subtle differences from the rings pictured. You will see the hammer strikes on the silver, and the impressions may be lighter or darker. Each ring measures about 2 mm. wide and set together they are just a hair over 8 mm. wide. Stacker rings are made to order in any size. They can be customized with different stampings or even lettering. If you are interested in purchasing rings like these customized or individually, please contact me.

name: Fleur de Lis Studs
description:
Little 1/4 inch (7 mm.) sterling silver discs are stamped with French fleur de lis, and soldered onto a sterling silver post. I've oxidized these studs to bring out the design and tumbled them for a shiny finish. C'est fabuleux, n'est pas? Oui!

*Studs are available in many designs!

name: Leaves
description:
Sterling silver leaves. Simple, bright, casual.

These leaves have been hand sawn from sterling silver sheet. The veining has been stamped into the silver and darkened with oxidation. I've given the silver a matte finish. Sterling silver posts are soldered securely to the back and sterling silver ear nuts keep them in place. They measure about 3/4 inch long (30 mm.) and 3/8 inch at the widest point (29 mm.).

name: Initial Charm Bracelet
description:
A 6" sterling silver torque bracelet with one initial charm attached. 

The charms are handmade from 2 squares of sheet sterling silver.  Each is unique.  It is stamped with the letter of your choice and then embellished at the corners with a design stamp.  It is then soldered to a larger piece of sterling silver sheet. The charm is about 15 mm long by 13 mm wide, although sizes vary slightly. This charm will be suspended from the charm bracelet on a very sturdy jump ring. The bracelet has two sterling silver balls at each end of the cuff, one of which can be screwed off and on to accommodate more charms. You can add as many charms and beads as the bracelet will hold!

Please specify a letter when ordering. Any letter (or number) is available. I will gladly add additional charms for $28 each (additional torques may also be purchased). Any name, date or other message stamped on the back will be an additional $7. If you would like to purchase the charm for your own charm bracelet separately or on a necklace, or customize a charm, please contact Nina Gibson Designs! 

These charms are special and have a rustic, handmade look to them. They make especially nice bridesmaids' gifts. Initial charms are also available on a necklace chain.
